db_fRol module¶

db_fRol.insert_rol(work, lvl)¶

Inserts rol in table.

Parameters:
  • work (String) – Name of rol
  • level (Integer) – Level of rol
Returns:

Rol object, or None if IntegrityError
db_fRol.get_rol(rolname)¶

Retrieves rol object from database.

Parameters:rolname (String) – Name of the rol to retrieve
Returns:Rol object, or None if DoesNotExist
db_fRol.get_all_registers(sort=False, value=None)¶

Obtains all the registers of the Rol table. Admits a sorting option.

Parameters:
  • sort (Boolean) – If True, will sort
  • value (String) – By which field will be the registers sorted (rolname, level)
Returns:

SelectQuery with the registers
db_fRol.get_name(rol)¶

Returns the name of a rol.

Parameters:rol (Rol) – Rol object
Returns:String
db_fRol.get_level(rol)¶

Returns the level of a rol.

Parameters:rol (Rol) – Rol object
Returns:Integer
